description: All the features you expect from our Light Hiker collection, but now in 1/4 sock height. Modest enough for a Victorian aristocrat, and equally familiar with dominating vast stretches of land, these ankle-covering socks offer a smooth cuff, legendary fit, and lightweight functionality that truly endures. Cushion extending up the Achilles adds targeted comfort and enhances the durability.
name: Darn Tough Socks Light Hiker 1/4 Lightweight Socks - Mens

specs.value: Hiking shoes, trail runners, hiking sandals
